channel.title: Chaning ::pvp coords (508/525)
channel.description: i have recently got back to coding this source and its 508/525, i have been trying to find out how to change the coords of ::pvp tele

item.title: Chaning ::pvp coords (508/525)
item.dc:creator: @pop_pop pop pop
item.description:
@pop_pop wrote:

no the coords arent in command.java ha look…

if (cmd[0].equals("pvp")) { if (!p.bountyArea()) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.Overlay = 0; p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.getActionSender().showInterface(p, 676); p.getActionSender().showChatboxInterface(p, 798); } if (p.jailed == 1) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You are jailed!"); return; } if (p.bountyArea()) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command in Bounty Hunter."); return;

Read full topic

item.title: Chaning ::pvp coords (508/525)
item.dc:creator: @Pest Pest
item.description:
@Pest wrote:

that’s an easy fix mate… Search Commands.java, then ctrl + f, search for (“pvp”),
you should get a code like this:if (cmd[0].equals("pvp")) { p.teleportTo(3186, 3442, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p,"Welcome to Varrock pvp"); }THIS IS A 525 COMMAND, So yeah…Change the first two,(3186, 3442) to your new coords…type ::coords, ::mypos, or whatever it is for your stuff. hope i helped, Isaiah.

Read full topic
